LanguageData.EggFRaptorFertilized.label: raptor egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggFRaptorFertilized.description: Fertilized raptor egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby feather raptor. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggFTurtleFertilized.label: fortress turtle egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggFTurtleFertilized.description: Fertilized fortress turtle egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby fortress turtle. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
